summary: Frontend testing completed for dynamic question time feature in ParagraphCard and FinalQuestionsSection. All 5 features tested and verified working correctly.
passed_tests: ParagraphCard shows dynamic question time (+170s) when timer is running instead of static +35s
Question time changes when advancing between paragraphs (170s → 239s → 493s)
FinalQuestionsSection shows dynamic time with differential indicator (+458)
Differential indicator (+X or -X) displayed next to adjusted time
Color indicators change based on time availability (green for more time)
Tiempo por pregunta section shows dynamic time with comparison to original 35s
COMPLETADO indicator shows on completed paragraphs
LEYENDO AHORA indicator shows on current paragraph
Start from specific paragraph feature working

dynamic_question_time_in_paragraph_card.details: When timer is running, questions in ParagraphCard show adjustedQuestionTime (e.g., +170s, +239s, +493s) instead of static +35s

time_changes_on_paragraph_advance.details: Time per question increases as user advances through paragraphs faster than expected reading time

final_questions_dynamic_time.details: FinalQuestionsSection shows dynamic time with total and per-question breakdown

differential_indicator.details: Shows (+X) next to time indicating difference from original 35s (e.g., +458)

color_indicators.details: Green colors used when more time available, orange/red for low time warnings

critical_code_review_comments: Implementation correctly passes adjustedQuestionTime from HomePage (line 574) to ParagraphCard
ParagraphCard correctly uses adjustedQuestionTime when isTimerRunning is true (lines 199-234)
Color logic properly handles positive/negative time differences
